name: powder
flavor_text: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.
effect_text_extend: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
effect_text_simple: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
